thread.title: WBPSC Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for Head Master/ Mistress Posts
thread.title_full: WBPSC Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for Head Master/ Mistress Posts

author: freejobalert.com
title: WBPSC Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for Head Master/ Mistress Posts
text: WBPSC Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for Head Master/ Mistress Posts WBPSC Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for Head Master/ Mistress Posts: West Bengal Public Service Commission (WBPSC) has advertised a notification for the recruitment of Head Master/ Mistress vacancies in English medium Government High Madrasah under the Minority Afffairs and Madrasah Education Department, Govt of west Bengal. Eligible candidates can apply online from 12-01-2017 at 11.30 AM to 03-02-2017. Other information like age limit, educational qualification, selection process, application fee & how to apply are given below… WBPSC Vacancy Details: Total No. of Posts: 12 Name of the Post: Head Master/ Head Mistress Age Limit: Candidates age should not less than 35 years and not more than 50 years as on 01-01-2017. Age relaxation is 5 years to SC and ST candidates of West Bengal and upto 3 years to OBC (category ’A’ or ‘B’) candidates of West Bengal admissible as per rules. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess Second class Master’s Degree from a recognized university, First class Bachelor of Education (B.Ed.) or its equivalent recognized by National Council for Teacher Education, Ability to teach in English and Good power of expression in English. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on applicants perfomance in Screening Test/ Written Test. Application Fee: Applicants required to pay Rs.210/- +Service Charge 1% of Examination Fee subject to a minimum of Rs.5/- (Rupees Five) only for online payment through debit/credit card plus service charge as Govt. Duty or Service Charge of Rs.5/- (Rupees Five) only for Net Banking or Service Charge of Rs.20/- (Rupees Twenty) only for payment through Bank Counter (off-line payment). No fee for SC/ ST candidates of West Bengal/ Persons with disabilities (PWD) having physical disability of 40% and above candidates. How to Apply: Eligible candidates can apply Online through the website www.pscwb.org.in or www.pscwbonline.gov.in can apply online from 12-01-2017 at 11.30 AM to 03-02-2017. Important Instructions to Apply Online: 1. Online applicants should log on to the website www.pscwb.org.in or www.pscwbonline.gov.in. 2. Complete the One Time Registration & Read the Instructions. 3. Select the desired post & Apply Online 4. Fill all the details in the application form & Submit the form. 5. Take print copy of application form for future use. Important Dates: Start Date to Apply Online: 12-01-2017 from 11.30 AM. Last Date to Apply Online & payment of Fee through online: 03-02-2017. Last Date for payment of Fee through Offline: 04-02-2017. For more details like category, tenure, remuneration, vacancy details, emolument, selection process, age relaxation, Salary and benefits, compensation & other information click on the link given below…
